SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C.productType, C.xmmc, C.nhll, C.cjqx, C.hkfs, C.xmze, ( CASE WHEN ISNULL(C.sykt) THEN 0.00 ELSE C.sykt END ) AS sykt, 100 - ROUND(sykt / C.xmze) * 100 jd, C.productStatus, C.type, C.OID, C.isRecommend, C. NO, C.szds, C.JXother FROM ( SELECT 3 productType, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainRuning.packageName xmmc, ROUND( WEBP2P_ProductRateInfo.yearRate * 100, 2 ) nhll, CEILING( WEBP2P_ProductRateInfo.productTerm ) cjqx, WEBP2P_ProductRateInfo.repaymentType hkfs, IFNULL( SUM( WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.biddingAmount ), 0 ) xmze, SUM( WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.biddingAmount - WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.holdingAmount ) sykt, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainRuning.productStatus productStatus, 'hh' type, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainRuning.OID OID, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainRuning.isRecommend, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainRuning. NO, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainRuning.szds, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainRuning.JXother FROM WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainRuning LEFT JOIN WEBP2P_PackageMainContentMapping ON WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainRuning.OID = WEBP2P_PackageMainContentMapping.mainOID LEFT JOIN WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning ON WEBP2P_PackageMainContentMapping.contentOID = WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.OID, WEBP2P_ProductRateInfo WHERE WEBP2P_ProductRateInfo.OID = WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainRuning.productRateInfoID AND WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainRuning.productStatus != 99 GROUP BY WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainRuning.OID ) C ) allbidding where szds is null or szds ='0' ORDER BY
allbidding.productStatus + 0, allbidding.productType, allbidding. NO DESC ${sortp}, allbidding.JXother DESC, allbidding.cjqx, SUBSTRING_INDEX(allbidding.xmmc, '-' ,- 1) DESC limit #{startPos},#{pageSize}
